description: Peach size 6 cotton t-shirt appliqued with a green Christmas tree. Matching elastic waisted cotton skirt in green gnome fabric. A lovely alternative to red and green for Christmas! And on sale!

name: Blue Rosette Clip
description:
Such a beautiful piece!  This statement clip is made with a pale blue lace rosette, white grosgrain ribbon bow and a sparkly pearl heart button. It measures 9cm across.

Clip it in your hair or on a dress as a brooch!  

All Molly and Mama hair accessories are attached to 48mm alligator clips that are lined with grosgrain ribbon and a non-slip grip. This helps them say in fine hair.

name: 'Doll Face' PDF Applique Pattern and Template
description:
The Doll Face applique design is the latest in the Molly and Mama pattern range. She's sure to become a favourite at your place! Perfect for the beginner! 

This listing is for a PDF printable pattern for the Doll Face applique design. This pattern comes with alternative hair designs so that there are 3 girly options and one for boys as well! You can choose your own fabrics and applique Doll Face on anything you like! 

The pattern includes a template of the pieces to trace, and a placement guide. Full instructions to machine or hand blanket stitch your design are also provided, along with photos and tips too. This template is suitable for beginners. 

*This listing is for a PDF file of a PRINTABLE PATTERN for the Doll Face design. This pattern will be emailed to you and you can then print the file at home. This listing is not for the actual completed product. Please allow 24 - 48 hours for your pattern to be emailed. 

*This pattern is for personal use only. If you are an individual sewing from home, permission is granted to make and sell small quantities of these items. Please credit Molly and Mama with any online descriptions of products made using Molly and Mama patterns. The web link is www.MollyandMama.com.au. This pattern may not be sold, printed, shared, distributed or re-produced in any form. This pattern may not be used to mass-produce items. 

Thanks for choosing Molly and Mama! See more at www.facebook.com/MollyandMama

description:

name: 'Miss Molly' Pin Cushion PDF Pattern
description:
Miss Molly is all sweetness and smiles! She's certainly the prettiest way to store your sewing pins. This pattern gives you step by step instructions and the pattern template so you can hand stitch up this felt pin cushion in as little as an afternoon! 

*This listing is for a PDF file of a PRINTABLE PATTERN for the Miss Molly pin cushion. This pattern will be emailed to you and you can then print the file at home. This listing is not for the actual completed product. Please allow 24 - 48 hours for your pattern to be emailed.

name: SIZE 1 'Strawberry Surprise' Set
description:
The 'Strawberry Surprise' set has a bib front apple green short sleeve tee, and a polka dot trimmed strawberry skirt in designer cotton. 

The t-shirt design was sketched by hand, and drawn into an applique design. Like all Molly and Mama appliques, the pieces were hand traced and then cut, placed, and blanket stitched by machine. 

This design (like all our appliques) is made with lots of care and attention to detail, and with superior materials and trims, so that you receive a garment that continues to look great, wash after wash!

This item will be sent with regular postage. Please add REGISTERED POST to your item before checking out, to opt for a signature on delivery. Molly and Mama cannot be held responsible once parcels are in the hands of Australia Post. 

Thanks for choosing Molly and Mama! See more at www.facebook.com/MollyandMama

name: SIZE 3 'Miss Bonny' Vest
description:
What a sweet way to keep the chills at bay! This reversible vest has blue minky fur on the outside (with white polka dots) and is lined with soft white flannelette with navy polka dots. A grosgrain ribbon bow secures the vest in the front.
